amendment.description: To facilitate the availability of child care for the children of members of the Armed Forces on active duty in connection with Operation Enduring Freedom or Operation Iraqi Freedom.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3427 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S6915-6918) To facilitate the availability of child care for the children of members of the Armed Forces on active duty in connection with Operation Enduring Freedom or Operation Iraqi Freedom.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3427 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Murray.
